name: red-chain
short_effect: Used to bind Palkia and Dialga.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A mythical chain that is said to link the Legendary Pokémon that created the Sinnoh region.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A mythical chain that is said to link the Legendary Pokémon that created the Sinnoh region.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A mythical chain that is said to link the Legendary Pokémon that created the Sinnoh region.
